meanings: be involved in, get tangled up (with), be intertwined[entangled] with

vlive.korean: 그때부터 세 사람의 관계가 엮여있거든요. That's when the 3 people's road crosses. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]왕은 사랑한다 X 앞터V(The King In Love X Early Interview)
vlive.english: That's when the 3 people's road crosses.

vlive.korean: [맞는 말이긴 한데 엄마까지 엮여 있어서] 저희 엄마도 엮여있고 해가지고. [That's true but] My mother is also involved in this, so... 듣기 View video Big Picture : 빅픽처 ep13_메이드 브라더스VS상민 떼인 돈 누가 누가 많나?!
vlive.english: [That's true but] My mother is also involved in this, so...

vlive.korean: 이렇게 신마다 같이 함께하는 배우들이 엮이는 게 다르게 엮여요. The characters come in different combination for each scene. 듣기 View video C-JeS : 샤엘의 뮤지컬 <데스노트> 출근길~
vlive.english: The characters come in different combination for each scene.

vlive.korean: 제가 봤을 때 아마 가족이 엮여있는 사건에 대해 표현하신 것 같아요. I think it's about the situation that's linked with his family. 듣기 View video 10PM : 월요일 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스(게스트:제국의아이들 정희철x제이스타) A night's entertainment news
vlive.english: I think it's about the situation that's linked with his family.

vlive.korean: [내가 경솔했네 미안해 하하야] 미안해 온 가족이 엮여 있구나. [Sorry, I was thoughtless] I'm sorry. I didn't know your whole family was involved. 듣기 View video Big Picture : 빅픽처 ep13_메이드 브라더스VS상민 떼인 돈 누가 누가 많나?!
vlive.english: [Sorry, I was thoughtless] I'm sorry. I didn't know your whole family was involved.

examples.korean: Her hair was interlaced with ribbons and flowers. 발음듣기 그녀의 머리에는 리본과 꽃이 엮여 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her hair was interlaced with ribbons and flowers. 발음
